titleStmt.title: SII 14.228: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 228. (A.R. No. 111 of 1908.) TIRUPPATTŪR, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE maṇḍapa IN THE TIRUTTAḶĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This epigraph dated in the tenth year and 205th day of the king registers remission of taxes amounting to 43(2/20) māḍai on two hamlets for providing worship to the god Tiruttaḷi-Mahādēva at Tiruppattūr a brahmadēya in Kēraḷaśiṅga-vaḷanāḍu. At the request of Kāliṅgarāyaṉ the king is stated to have issued this order while he was seated in the paḷḷikkaṭṭil called Pāṇḍiyaṉ in the hall Aḷagiyapāṇḍiyaṉ in the inner precincts of the palace at Madurai.
An officer named Parākramapāṇḍiya-Uttaramantri figures in the record and so a � Parākrama-Pāṇḍya must have been a predecessor or at least a contemporary of this Śrīvallabhadēva.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tirumaṭantaiyuñjayamaṭa
ntaiyun tiruppuyaṅkaḷi ṉiṉitiruppa Iruni
lamum perumai yeyta veṇṭicaiyuṅ ku
ṭainiḻaṟṟa maṉṉavarellām van=tiṟaiñca varu
marapil muṭicūṭi teṉ(ṅ)kumariyum vaṭakeṅkaiyu
n=tiraikkaṭalume yellaiyākap pārmuḻutuṅ kayalā
ṇai parantu ceṅkoluṭaṉ vaḷara maṉṉiya virasiṁhāsaṉat
tu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya māmutal mati
kkulam viḷakkiya komutaṟk koccaṭaiyapanmarāṉa tribhuvaṉa
ccakravattikaḷ śrīvallabhadevaṟkku yāṇṭu pattāvatu nāḷiru
nūṟṟaiñciṉāl māṭakkuḷakkiḻ maturai yuḷḷālai Aḻaki
ya pāṇṭiyaṉ kūṭattiṟ paḷḷikkaṭṭil pāṇṭiyaṉi leḻunta
ruḷiyiruntu ceyyat tiruvāy moḻintaruḷiṉapaṭi . keraḷaciṅ
kavaḷanāṭṭu brahmadeyan tirupputtūrt tiruttaḷi mahā
de vaṟkkut tiruppaṭimāṟ ṟuḷḷiṭṭaRead uḷḷiṭṭu.veṇṭu nimantaṅkaḷukku I
ṟuppatāka Iṉṉāṭṭu maṇṇāṇimaṅkalamāṉa meṟtiru
maṅkalam māṭai patiṉeḻaraiye Orumāvum kiḻmuḷ
ḷivayal māṭai Irupattaiñce mukkāle muṉṟumā
vum Āka māṭai nāṟpattu muṉṟe yoṉpatu māvum
yāṇṭu pattāvatu mutal devadāṉam Iṟaiyiliyāy
Iṟuppatākap peṟaveṇṭumeṉṟu kāliṅkarāya
ṉ namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil keraḷaciṅkavaḷanāṭṭu bra
hmadeyan tirupputtūrt tiruttaḷi mahātevaṟkkut tiruppa
ṭimāṟ ṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭu nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppa
tāka Iṉṉāṭṭu maṇṇāṇimaṅkalamā
ṉa meṟttirumaṅkala māḷaṭa patiṉeḻarai
ye yorumāvum kiḻmuḷḷivayal māṭai
Irupattaiñce mukkāle muṉṟumāvum Āka
māṭaiya nāṟppattu muṉṟeyoṉ(m)patu
māvum yāṇṭu pattāvutu mutal Iṟaiyiliyākak kuṭu
ttomeṉṟu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷinār . Ivai parā
kramapāṇṭiya Utta(manti)ramantiri yeḻuttiṉāl muṭittu
Ivvūrkaḷukkup perunāṉṅkellai kiḻellai Āṟṟu
kku meṟkkum teṉṉellai cuvaramaṅkalattukkum po
ttikuṭik kaṟkuḷattukkum peruṅkuḷattukkum vaṭak
kum melellai melmuḷḷi vayalukkum tulaiyāni
lai vayakkal varampu vaṭakku nokkippoṉa cevvai
kkuk kiḻakkum vaṭavellai miṟai vayalukkum U
ḷaikkuṭikkum Āṟṟukkut teṟkum Āka Illicai
tta perunāṉṅkellaik kakappaṭṭa Ivvūrira
ṇṭum vaḷaiyiṟ(c) cuṟṟumuṟṟum Uṇṇila
moḻiviṉṟi tiruttaḷi mahādevaṟkku Iṟaiyili
yākak kuṭuttom �The inscription stops here.
Digital edition of SII 14.228 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
